# target

**Instance Property**

The language to translate content into.

## Declaration

```swift
var target: Locale.Language?
```

## Discussion

If left to its default value of `nil`, the session picks a target language according to the `source` and the person’s [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/Locale/preferredLanguages]. Changing this value cancels the previous tasks and creates a new one.
title: target
